name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot, equipped with a shiny black box and retro console buttons. Its arms and legs are designed with a unique 'hand down' feature, allowing it to interact with its surroundings more effectively. The robot's screen emits a powerful laser, enabling it to perform precise measurements and analysis. Pixel is a proud member of the WebtrES club, utilizing its oscilloscope capabilities to contribute to cutting-edge web technologies.
